segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not notice the mess she’s making?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and the cabinets are getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s just standing there, drying dishes like everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip and fall if she doesn’t turn off the water soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout at her to wake up and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and she’s just standing in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand how someone could be so oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just careless and irresponsible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and fixes this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
